job.title: Software Engineer - Early Career
job.description:
Going to space is just the beginning. It’s what you do when you get there that matters. Lockheed Martin builds satellites and spacecraft that do amazing things in space for government and commercial customers. Connecting people. Advancing discovery. And protecting what matters most. Lockheed Martin-built satellites give earlier warning of severe weather, connect troops on the battlefield, and deliver GPS directions to a billion people worldwide.
As we look to the future, we’re driving innovations to help our customers do even more in orbit. That’s why we’re crafting smarter satellites that operate like smartphones in the sky, with apps that can be updated in orbit so they can adapt as mission needs on the ground change. Your mission is ours. And as that mission evolves, we’ll be ready. Will you? What does this role look like?
As a Software Engineer for Special Programs APD-ME, you will join a multi-discipline team executing activities required to design and deliver mission processing apps. APD-ME has been accelerating development of new apps to meet critical mission needs of our customers. You will be responsible for the design, development, integration and testing of new apps as well as the operations and maintenance of existing apps. You will also work collaboratively in product teams to successfully deliver mission processing apps to Ops.
